characters

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • characters.Shape
      • characters.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape
    The Line class represents a double-precision Line that can be drawn using the Processing library. It also focused on the ability to detect intersections with other Lines. This Version doesn't solve for vertical, horizontal, collinear, or parallel lines.
    Version:
    9/20/21
    Author:
    frank_an

      • Line

            double yOne,
            double xTwo,
            double yTwo)
        Initializes a line by using two points the start and end points
        Parameters:
        xOne - X-coordinate of first point.
        yOne - Y-coordinate of first point.
        xTwo - X-coordinate of second point.
        yTwo - Y-coordinate of second point.

    • Method Detail

      • constructLineFromAngle

        public static Line constructLineFromAngle(double x1,
                                          double y1,
                                          double angle,
                                          double length)
        Creates a Line object that from a starting point and a angle and the length of the Line.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The x value of the starting point of the Line.
        y1 - The y value of the starting point of the Line.
        angle - The angle of the Line and where it starts drawing.
        length - How long the lines runs at a certain angle.
        Returns:
        A Line object created without a second point.
        Precondition:
        The 3rd parameter has to be an angle length and the length has to be a positive length.
        Postcondition:
        A new line object will be created.

      • setPoint2

        public void setPoint2(double x2,
                      double y2)
        Sets this lines second point (x2, y2) to a new coordinate
        Parameters:
        x2 - The new X-coordinate for the second point.
        y2 - The new Y-coordinate for the second point.
        Postcondition:
        The Line object has a new second point.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a Line object with the PApplet and uses the two points of the Line object, with a stroke color based on the strokeColor of Shape.
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - The Processing PApplet on which to draw the Rectangle.
        Precondition:
        drawer must be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc.)

      • getIntersectionX

        public double getIntersectionX(Line other)
        Returns the x coordinate of the intersection point of this line and the other line (assuming they continue forever)
        Parameters:
        other - A Line object that the method finds the x-value of the point of Intersection between other Line and this Line.
        Returns:
        The x-value of the intersection point of the two Lines.

      • getIntersectionY

        public double getIntersectionY(Line other)
        Returns the y coordinate of the intersection point of this line and the other line (assuming they continue forever)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The y-value of the intersection point of the two Lines.

      • intersects

        public boolean intersects(Line other)
        Returns true if this line segment and the segment other intersect each other. Returns false if they do not intersect.
        Parameters:
        other - A Line object that is set as an argument.
        Returns:
        True if the Line other and this Line intersect each other within their given domains, false if they don't.
